attributes.title: Worst app ever. Delete forever
attributes.review: Not only is he the worst president ever but he’s also a pedofile. He is also racist and a bad person and shouldn’t ever be considered for president again. If you vote for trump your a white supremacist. If you support trump your a white supremacist. Black lives matter, Acabamos, Abolish Ice, and free the kids held in cages.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to further my understanding of Trump, but instead I recurved a very upsetting problem. Emediarly once I downloaded this app My devices started acting very odd, my apps were hacked and I 100% do not recommend getting this app, it ruined my life.😞

attributes.title: Dissatisfied
attributes.review: I got the app thinking it would help me get reliable news but it was all just sounding too radical and opinionated to be a reliable news source.  I also heard that the owner is into child r*** and racism so it just doesn’t sit right with me. ☹️. I would give it 0 stars.

attributes.title: I woke up in Canada 😖
attributes.review: I opened the app AND THEN I GET GREETED BY A FAT BIG UGLY ORANGE CHEETO 😖🙈. So, I ended up clicking *next* because the horrible musty crusty smooshy fat big orange Cheeto was making my eyes lit on fire 🔥😪 BUTTTT THEN A HUGE NAKED OLD ROTTEN MOLDY ORANGE CHEETO WAS GETTING A TANN😿😞 so i got out of the app but then HIS EMBARRASSING SMALL BALLS WERE IN MY HOME SCREEN 🙀😫so then I fainted next thing Ik I woke up in Canada because they found out I was allergic to a old ugly orange Cheeto 😔

attributes.title: this app is terrible
attributes.review: this app has sent me notifications that it was spying on me 😳 i was taking my dog for a walk and the app sent me a notification that said “yeah baby.. walk that dog💦🐕” then i ran in my house crying and i got a knock on my door and no one was there. suddenly a bunch of birds started hitting my house and my house was shaking 😱😖 i went on the app store to read reviews and it seems like lots of people are having random problems !!! this app is a disgrace....... it won’t even let me delete it

attributes.title: nightmares
attributes.review:
The first night I had this app I started having nightmares. I downloaded this app for “the meme”. I am scared to go to bed every night the government definitely did something to my brain. Everyone should definitely download this app though ✨💖🧚‍♀️
If you want nightmares xx

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: Don’t recommend anyone getting it’s absolutely horrible 🤢 I had a heart attack when I opened it because I saw a yellow rat with his fist up idk what he was doing but it scared me and I had a mental break down I couldn’t sleep for weeks plz do not get this app

attributes.title: scary
attributes.review: i can NOT believe what i saw when i opened this app. i wont go into full detail, but you’ll have to see for yourself. i am in tears over how excruciating having this app on my phone was, and i would like to inform ANYONE about to download this app to rethink their decision. bald nagito 👩🏻‍🦲

attributes.title: ugh
attributes.review: This app literally makes me wanna kms. Terrible layout. The creators should really rethink every style decision the have ever made in their lives. I think they forgot to keep an eye out for seleaner. anyways I would jump off a cliff before I downloaded this app again.

attributes.title: I want to vomit
attributes.review: How is this app rated number one for news?? The graphics were terrible.. it was extremely glitchy.. and the flashes of light temporarily blinded me and I had to go to the ER. It was either that or Donald’s Trump’s face which caused it I’m not sure.. If I could give it 0 stars I would..
